ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsummulc2.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |

| 3 |  | fsummulc2.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_fsummulc2 | |- ( ph -> ( C x. sum_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( C x. B ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3 | #P_fsumcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. CC ) |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B x. C ) = ( C x. sum_ k e. A B ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( B x. C ) = ( C x. B ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A ( B x. C ) = sum_ k e. A ( C x. B ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 6, 9 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B x. C ) = sum_ k e. A ( B x. C ) ) |
